body.description: 24" Diagonal viewable curved screen HDMI, VGA & PC audio in ports Windows 10 compatible Contemporary sleek metal design with the C248W-1920RN, a slender 1800R screen curvature yields wide-ranging images that seemingly surround you. Protection and comfort are the hallmarks of this design as the metal pattern brush finish is smooth and pleasing to the touch. 1080P resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels) provides stunning color and picture detail on a 24 inch screen. Enjoy HDMI or VGA input to connect all video and gaming devices. Contrast Ratio : 3000: 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mother has improved my gaming performance. It is not expensive and high-quality. The colors are great. If you play Apex legends this modern will help you a lot. I will be buying another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I paired this with my sons gaming PC and headphones. He absolutely loves the screen. I must say the resolution was much better than I thought when I hooked it up beautiful color, clarity and quality on the screen. I do not have any complaints nor does he have any complaints? It is a great buy for the price I paid for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality for an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I love this monitor! You get such a high quality at such an affordable price point. It is also easy to assemble. My favorite feature is the fact that I can hook up multiple video sources to it. I also recently used the mounting mechanism on the back to mount the monitor to my office wall, making for a clean and sleek office space. I also use this monitor for gaming. There is no lag and the color is exceptional, it is on par with some of the more expensive brands. Definitely buy this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really like it so far
reviews.reviewText: I waited a few days to properly review. The quality isn’t bad at all, it’s 1080p, and has a decent refresh rate. The colors look nice, and the quality of the images are crisp. Delivery was good, everything came in perfect condition. However, I do have 2 complaints.The built in speakers are terrible. Very low and bad quality. You will definitely need an external speaker device for this. Another thing to be mindful of, is that the height of the stand is on the shorter side and it’s not adjustable so you need to be mindful of that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor works great with the gaming pc it was bought for. Not too big and a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous monitors with incredible picture quality and the curve is perfect to give you a more immersive feeling while gaming, purchased 2 for my son's podcast/gaming station to go on either side of his flat screen and they Are PERFECT!! HE'S PLAYED AROUND WITH DIFFERENT SETUPS AND LOVES THE VERSATILITY THAT ALL 3 MINITORS GIVE HIM AS WELL AS THE EFFECTS HE IS ABLE TO ENJOY FRIM THE DIFFERENT SETUPS DEPENDING ON WHAT HE US WORKING IN!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gaming monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best gaming monitors to game on! I highly recommend it it has very good graphics and sound, it works perfectly with my son's Xbox and I do like how it goes to energy saving mode if nothing is connected and you for get to turn it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used this over hundreds and hundreds of hours of gaming and have had no issues whatsoever. It was easy to set up, it looks great both off and on, the quality of it is outstanding, and I have yet to have any problems with it at all. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to upgrade from just a laptop screen or whatever the case may be.
La mejor relación calidad/precio en este tamaño. Namás no te molestes en usar las bocinas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen monitor por el precio de oferta
reviews.reviewText: Buen monitor para el precio en el que lo compre por promoción, cumple con su función ya que los utilizo para home office aún no lo pruebo con juegos.

reviews.reviewTitle: 75hz is in graphics control panel under PC.
reviews.reviewText: First, it is 75Hz but it defaults to 60hz at least if you connect via HDMI. The only place I found it was in the graphics driver control panel under PC connections. NOT under the standard (native) Ultra HD, HD, SD. Windows 10 settings menu is always a terrible excuse for administrative controls, you'll never find it there.The screen bezel comes in a bit when displayed about 5mm so it's not truely edgeless like a MacBook Pro. But it's a sleek looking monitor that's fairly sturdy.I was honestly worried it might be too thin like it would break in shipping, but it's slightly thicker than you'd expect which adds more to it's durability.The speakers are mostly treble, it feels very office space laptop speaker listening environment so it's fine for news clips and YouTube but if you want to listen to music you'll probably opt for headphones or a smart speaker of some kind to get any background or atmospherics unless you want it all treble and no bass. 7/10Overall I'm satisfied, it's a good match with my budget gaming PC, it doesn't overstress because of 144hz or 4k issues without an expensive graphics card.That in mind it's not 1440 or 4k so it's a nice LED curved monitor but if you press your face to the screen you can see very super tiny led pixels but then you're just getting the screen all oily.If these are big issues for you then you should be spending $500+ on a monitor and graphics card each because that's where the market is as of Mar/2020.
Me ha gustado mucho la pantalla, muy buena imagen y el que sea curva da otra sensación a la hora de utilizarla. Muy buen producto y ha llegado muy rápido sin ningún inconveniente.

reviews.reviewTitle: It isn't being sold for 180 it is now being sold for 500
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is amazing and well worth the money I was a little skeptical at first but when I received it it completely changed my mind this thing is awesome the only problem I have is I wanted two of them for my gaming setup I purchased one of them for a $180 and when I went to purchase another one they're now trying to sell it for $500 which really sucks because now I can't complete the rest of my gaming setup with the matching monitor this monitor is worth $180 all day but not worth $500 hopefully they fix it so that way I can purchase another one but other than that it is worth it
